Posts.Content: Mar 30, 2010 01:02AM figgy652 wrote: What does DX mean?  I am new to this.  Anyway, the first onc I saw suggested that at 56 my daily glass or two of wine could have been the reason I got breast cancer.  I was so upset.  I changed Dr's and the new one said to limit alcohol to not daily and in moderation.  I feel not so lucky to be PR-  It is the reason I started arimidex a month ago after radiation and lumpectomy.  Still trying to navigate all of this.  I am having a hard time learning to live with uncertainty.
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker

Posts.Content: Mar 30, 2010 12:22AM figgy652 wrote: I am also ER+ and PR-  My oncologist told me they have known for years the connection between alcohol and BC.  He said to limit alcohol to occasionally and only one drink.  I loved my glass of wine every night with dinner and I hate feeling guilty when I do drink wine 2 or 3 times a week.  He said alcohol of any kind  has an estrogen effect on the body and here I am 100% estrogen positive. I hate giving up small pleasures!
